SignInWithEmail.helpText: Enter the email and password associated with your AFSCME membership.

EnterValidationCode.helpText: Enter the member validation code you received

ConfirmWithMemberId.helpText: Enter your member id # and either the email or phone associated with your membership.

VerificationOpts.helpText: We need to validate your AFSCME membership before we can proceed. Choose an option below:

ContactServicesSettings.helpText: We could not assert your membership status. Please contact membership services to confirm your membership status.
